name: Ragnaromp!
description:
Play as Thicc Thor and romp over Hel's minions to win the game!
Ragnaromp is a flash-era inspired Temple-Run-esque/ExciteBike game full of comedic gore and sounds with some hard scaling levels.

Controls: Use space bar to throw Mjolnir and press up and down to switch lanes!

Made during the VGAD 2018 Fall Game Jam by:

Justine Bendico: Producer

Julian Eveneshen: Sound

Abay Rysbek: Art

Hugh Bagan: Programmer

Atharv Vohra: Programmer
